text: The Enchanted Cottage is a 1945 American romantic fantasy movie directed by John Cromwell and was based on the 1923 play of the same name by Arthur Wing Pinero. It stars Dorothy McGuire, Robert Young, Herbert Marshall, Mildred Natwick, Spring Byington, Hillary Brooke, Richard Gaines and was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1946. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1945 romance movies Category:1940s fantasy movies Category:American romantic fantasy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by John Cromwell
title: The Enchanted Cottage (1945 movie)
